one.body: Red Cross REST API ifasha abakora kugera ku butumwa bwihutirwa n'inkomoko itangwa n'ihuriro ry'imiryango ya Kuruwa Ruje ku isi.
one.heading: Intangiriro

support_card.body: Ku bibazo bijyanye na API ya Kuruwa Ruje, andikira kuri dev@3sidedcube.com
support_card.title: Ubufasha n'Ibibazo

two.body: Imbuga zose za murandasi munyandiko za  API v1.0 zifite iyi ntangiriro URL:
two.heading: URL y'ibanze

four.body:
API isaba ububasha bwo kugera ku bubiko ikoresheje urufunguzo rwa API. Kubona urufunguzo rwa API, Ubwambere {0}.

Ibisabwa na API byose bigomba kuba bifite umutwe wa HTTP:
four.heading: Ukwemeza

descriptions.ok: Ubusabe bwagenze neza kandi ibyo mwasabye bifite ububiko byasabwemo.
descriptions.found: Erekana icyerekezo Ikibazo ku kugira ubusabe URI aho ubishaka: Umutwe.
descriptions.not_allowed: Erekana HTTP uburyo bwakoreshejwe ntibwemerewe kuri ubu bubiko.
descriptions.server_error: Habaye ikibazo kuri seriveri naho byasabwe ntibigoba kugaruka.
descriptions.unavailable: Serivise usabye ntabwo ibasha kuboneka Ongera uyisabe nanone mumwanya.

card.body: Buri muryango wa Red Cross ushobora gutanga ikimenyetso rusange ukoresheje {0} v1.2.
card.title: Uburyo busanzwe bwo kumenyekanisha

six.example: Muri uru rugero, akarango {0} gashobora gusimbuzwa kode y'igihugu mu itsinda ryatazwe. urugero:
six.feed_intro: Ubutumwa kuri buri tsinda buratangwa, hari urutonde rw'ubutumwa bwibutsa bwatangajwe na sosiyete, byagendeye kuri
six.heading: Urujyano rw'integuza y'ibyihutirwa
six.intro: Ikirango cya CAP dutangwa n'amashyirahamwe yose dutangazwa ukoresheje ibyihutirwa bya RSS. Ibi bishobora kugerwaho hakoreshejwe impere zikurikira:

seven.heading: Inyandiko y'integuza ya CAP
seven.body: Inyandiko y'ikirango cya CAP zishobora kugerwaho hakoreshejwe umurongo wihariye usobanurwa muri buri nkuru nshya ya RSS. Akarango k'umurongo wa murandasi  ukoresha izi shusho:

eight.body:
Amaherezo akurikira atanga amakuru yatangajwe akozwe n'amashyirahamwe ya Red Cross mugufasha mukwitegura ibiza mubihe bitandkanye.

Buri cyinjiye gitanga amakuru kuntambwe esheshatu kugucunga ibiza:
eight.heading: What Now

one.heading: Intamwe ya 1 - Iyandikishe
one.body:
Kugira ngo utangire gukoresha amakuru ava kuri API y'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda, banza {0} kuri Porotokole y'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda.

Urashobora gukoresha konti yawe ya Facebook & Google, cyangwa imeri yo gukora konti.

two.body: Kugira ngo ukoreshe API, ugomba gukora porogaramu muri Porotokole y'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda. Tubwire bike ibyo uri gukora.
two.heading: Intambwe ya 2 - Kora porogaramu

three.body:
Igihe wakoze porogaramu, urufunguzo rwa API ruzahita ruboneka.

{0} Wibuke kubika aka kantu muburyo burinzwe bishoboka kandi urinde gusangiza cyangwa gushyira hanzw urufunguzo rwa API yawe muri porogaramu yawe.
three.heading: Intambwe ya 3- Gira urufunguzo rwa API

four.body:
API y'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda ikoresha HTTP(S) kandi itanga aho kugeraho amakuru asohotse.

Gusaba buri gihuzo bigomba guhamya ukoresheje urufunguzo rwa API rwakozwe mu nzira yabanje.
four.heading: Intambwe ya 4 - Kora ubusabe
four.moreInfo: Kumakuru arenze ho ku mpera za API, reba {0}.

new_welcome.text_header: Gerageza kandi usangire ubutumwa bw'umutekano bwa Croix-Rouge Croix-Crescent ku mbuga zawe.
new_welcome.bottom_text: Email ikipe ya IFRC niba ufite ibibazo: im@ifrc.org

step_1.text: Hanga urufunguzo rwa API kugira ngo ukoreshe API muri banki y'ibibazo. Tubwire ibyo uri kubaka.

step_2.header: Intambwe ya 2: Akira urufunguzo rwa API
step_2.text: Iyo umaze gukora urufunguzo rwa API, ruzahita rwikora.
step_2.text_2: Icyitonderwa: Bika urufunguzo rwawe rwa API mu buryo bwizewe bushoboka. Irinde gusangiza cyangwa kugaragaza urufunguzo rwawe rwa API muri porogaramu yawe bwite.

step_3.text: API ya database ikoresha HTTP(S) kandi itanga inzira za RESTful zo kubona amakuru yasohotse. Buri busabe bugomba kwemezwa hakoreshejwe urufunguzo rwa API rwakozwe mu cyiciro cyabanje. Kubona amakuru arambuye ku nzira zose za API, reba inyandiko za API

step_4.text: Sangiza ubutumwa bw'umutekano bwa Croix-Rouge na Croissant-Rouge ku baturage igihe hari icyago. Ushobora kuvugana n'itsinda rya IFRC niba ufite ibitekerezo ku butumwa: im@ifrc.org

step_1.text: Suzuma urutonde rw'ubutumwa kugira ngo urebe ubutumwa bw'Umuryango w'Abaholandi w'Umuryango utabara imbabare w'Umuryango utabara imbabare.

step_2.text: Hitamo Umuryango w'Igihugu ushaka kureba. Hanyuma uhitemo ubwoko bw'ibyago mu rutonde ruboneka.

step_3.text: Shaka uburyo bwo gukuramo ubutumwa. Ushobora gusangiza itsinda ry'ubutumwa nk'ishusho cyangwa nka PDF. Kuramo kandi usuzume kugira ngo wemeze ko usangiza ubutumwa bukwiye.

upload_modal.drag_button_text: Kanda cyangwa kurura ifishi muri aka gace kugirango uyishyireho

whatnow.title: Ubutumwa
whatnow.set_attribution: Shyiraho amazina y'ishyirahamwe n'ubutumwa bijyanye bwo gutangaza
whatnow.empty: Nta butumwa bwo kwirinda bwasohotse kuri iyi Sosiyete y'Igihugu
whatnow.delete_content_translation: Ibi bizakuraho ibirimo by'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda byahiswemo muri ururimi rw'ubu
whatnow.no_languages: Shyiraho, cyangwa uhitemo ururimi ubashe gutangira
whatnow.add_language_message: Ongeraho ururimi rushya, ongeraho ibikubiyemo ujyendana nabyo
whatnow.add_language_attribution: Tegura inshingano ubashe gushyiraho ururimi rushya
whatnow.attribution_publish: Izi nshingano zizahita zibonekera mu itangaza

edit_whatnow.title: Umutwe
edit_whatnow.content_url_description: URL y'amakuru y'iyi butumwa bwo kwirinda. Nyamuneka wandike iby'ingingo, urugero: http:// cyangwa https://
edit_whatnow.mitigation_help: Ibikorwa by'igihe kirekire byo kugabanya ingaruka
edit_whatnow.mitigation_extra: Koroshya ibibazo ni interuro y'igihe kirekire igaragaza ibiza bishobora kubaho. Ibikorwa bikorwa ni isuzuma, igenamikorere n'ingamba zirambye zo kurwanya ibyago bibungabunga umuryang n'ibidukikije.
edit_whatnow.seasonalForecast_help: Ibikorwa by'ighe gito byo kurwanya ibiza
edit_whatnow.seasonalForecast_extra: Iteganyagihe niryo ridufasha guteganya ibiza bishobora kuba. Ibikorwa byafashe ni ugusuzuma ingaruka zishobora kuba n'ibikorwa biteganyijwe mu kugabanya ibyago no kurinda imiryango.
edit_whatnow.watch_extra: Hashyirwaho indorerezi igihe icyago cy'iyongereye bigaragara, ariko kubaho kwacyo, aho kibera n'igihe bizabera bitazwi neza. Bigamije gutanga igihe gihagije kurinda ibikowa no kwitegura gushaka igisubizo.
edit_whatnow.warning_extra: Integuza itangwa igihe ibiza birikuba, cyangwa byegereje cyangwa hari amahirwe menshi ko biba. Bishaka kuvuga igihe bishobora gutwara ubuzima w'umuntu cyangwa ibye. Abantu muri iyi nzira y'ibiza bagomba kugira ibikorwa by'ubwirinzi.
edit_whatnow.immediate_extra: Ibihe turimo bushobora kugira ingaruka ku buzima n'ibintu by'abantu. Izi ni ingamba z'ubwirinzi zihutirwa zigomba guhita zijya mu bikorwa mu gihe hagiye kuba ibyago. Ibikorwa by'ubutabazi bwo kwirinda no kurinda imiryango birakenewe.
edit_whatnow.recover_help: Ibikorwa bya nyuma byo kuva mu byago
edit_whatnow.recover_extra: Hari ibikorwa by'ubwirinzi bikorwa mu kugabanya ibyago bikurikira ibiza.
edit_whatnow.assess_and_plan: Gusesengura no Gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda
edit_whatnow.download_image_error: Ikosa mukubika iyi foto, menya neza ko watangaje impinduka zose kandi wongere ugerageze.
edit_whatnow.download_instructions: Emeza n'akantu k'iburyo unemeze "Bika ifoto nka...." kubika
edit_whatnow.early_warning_description: Ubutumwa bw'ingenzi bw'umutekano ku bihutirwa n'ibikorwa by'ubutabazi bw'ibanze
edit_whatnow.recovery_description: Ubutumwa bw'umutekano ku bikorwa byo kugarura ibintu mu buryo

example_alert.heading: Urugero rw'Uburyo bwo Kwirinda
example_alert.example_whatnow_request: Urugero rw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda bwa API
example_alert.example_content:
Ubujyanama ku kirere# 3 BWA NYUMA kugeza saa 11 Z'IGITONDO, Mut. 29, 2018
Ku bukonje bukabije

Ingaruka z'ubukonje bukabije zaragabanutse. Impinduka ku miterere y'ikirere zagaragaye kuri Nome. Nubwo haza mo imvura cyangwa inkuba, cyane cyane nyuma ya saa sita cyangwa nimugoroba , bishobora kuba byateganyijwe cyane mu burengerazuba.

Hamwe n'iri terambere, iyi niyo nama ya nyuma kuri ibi by'ikirere.

example_whatnow.alert_from: Integuza yatanzwe na: Kuruwa Ruje ya America
example_whatnow.heading: Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda ku Gahoro
example_whatnow.copy: Hari ibyo gukora mu kugabanya ingaruka no kwirinda n'abo mu rugo ubukonje bukabije.
example_whatnow.step_1: Rinda urugo rwawe. Reba ku matiyo ukoreshe n'ibishyushya witonze.
example_whatnow.step_3: Irinde ubwawe n'imyenda ishyushya ufubike ahano hose ku mubiri
example_whatnow.step_4: Witegure kandi witondere urubura igihe cy'urubura, cyane cyane igihe utwaye
example_whatnow.step_5: Reba abaturanyi, inshuti n'abandi bari mu kaga

register_form.national_society_description:
Sohora ubutumwa bw'ingenzi bw'umutekano bwa RCRC National Society yawe kugira ngo itangazamakuru mpuzamahanga, iry'igihugu, n'iry'akarere ribashe kubugeraho no kubutangaza.
Tuvugishe kugira ngo umenye byinshi ku buryo bwo gukora ubwo butumwa no guhuza n'abafatanyabikorwa mu itangazamakuru.

applicable_law.heading: Itegeko rikoreshwa

terms_service_page.body:
Urasabwa kubika amabanga n'umutekano  w'urufunguzo rwo kwiyandikisha wahawe na Kuruwa Ruje. Ushinzwe kubungabunga ikoreshwa rya API,  nkuko byakomeje kugenda bivugururwa, mu kugira ngo tubashe gukomeza twakira ikigega cy’amakuru. Kuruwa Ruje ishobora gutanga verisiyo ivuguruye ya API n'ikigega cy’amakuru ku ibanga ryawe. Verisiyo nshya ishobora kuba idahura n'ishyirwamubikorwa, kandi uremera gukoresha verisiyo iheruka ivuguruye y'ikigega cy’amakuru igihe cyose.

Uremera kudahindura, gusakaza, byasemywe , byaseshwe cyangwa kugarura agace ka API cyangwa porogaramu ya Kuruwa Ruje.

Ushobora kudakoresha API cyangwa ikigega cy’amakuru muburyo burenze kandi bwumvikana cyangwa bugizwe  ikoreshwa cyangwa iyonona rikabije, nkuko byagenwe na Kuruwa Ruje kububasha bwabo.

Ntushobora gukoresha API cyangwa ikigega cy’amakuru muburyo bumwe butemewe n'amategeko, kwibeshya, gusuzugura, bibi kandi bishobora kugtera gukora ikibi cyangwa kugirira nabi Kuruwa Ruje, itangwa rya serivisi, abatanga ibyabo, cyangwa undimuntu wese nkuko byagaragajwe mububasha bwayo

Kuruwa Ruje ishobora kugenzura ikoreshwa rya API n'ikigega cy’amakuru cyayo. Ntushobora gukoresha ubundi buryo ngo utivanga  niryo genzura, na Kuruwa Ruje ishobora gukoresha ubundi buryo igakemura icyo kibazo

Ikoresha  ry'Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa bigomba kugaragara gusa kuburyo bushya cyangwa buvuguruye aribwo bukoreshwa mu Imenyesha ry'ibikorwa rijyanye na serivise zihutirwa, uzavugurure Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa buri uko uvuguruye Ikigega cy’amakuru cyangwa Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa bya Kuruwa Ruje.

Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa ukoresha izaba ijyanye n'ibirere bitandukanye bitewe n'aho yatangiwe. Niba Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa rikubiyemo inkomoko nka Kuruwa Ruje y'Amerika, cyangwa nizindi nzego z'igihugu za Kuruwa Ruje cyangwa Kuruwasa Ruje (buri kimwe n' "inkomoko y'amakuru"), ushobora gukurikiza ho inkomoko y'amakuru bifitanye isano na buri gice cy' Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa  muburyo bwatanzwe mu Kigega cy’amakuru. Ugomba kudakomeza gukoresha buri nkomoko y'amakuru

Ntushobora gusemura Ikigega cy’amakuru, Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa cyangwa Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa murundi rurimi, ntushobora gukoresha, guhindura cyangwa gusubiramo, Ikigega cy’amakuru, Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa cyangwa gItegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa.

Ugomba gukora ku buryo Ikigega cy’amakuru, kiguma mu maboko yawe bwite.

Ntushobora kwemerera ko Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa, n' Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa byoherezwa kumukoresha wanyuma mu buryo no kwamamaza cyangwa gusaba inkunga.

Ntabwo wemerewe kubika Ikigega cy’amakuru muri rusange cyangwa igice.
terms_service_page.contact: Vugisha Kuruwa Ruje kuri {0} utange ibibazo byose bijyanye na API.
terms_service_page.disclaimer:
API n'Ikigega cy’amakuru bitangwa KUMPAMVU Y'AMAKURU N'INTEGO Z'UBUREZI GUSA nkuko biri kandi biboneka mubyibanze. Kuruwa Ruje ntihagararira cyangwa ngo itange ikizere kubyo aribyo byose, byaba mu bigaragara cyangwa mu bikekwa. Kuruwa Ruje isheshe ingwaate zose ,zigaragara cyangwa zikekwa , harimo ariko bitagarukiye mugukoresha ingwate zatangwa kumpamvu bwite. Kuruwa Ruje nabakozi bayo, abakorera mubiro, abahagarariye ibihugu byabo nabakorera izindi sosiyete nabishingizi ntibazagenderwaho mugihe hari icyangijwe  mu ikoreshwa rya API, Ikigega cy’amakuru, Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa, cyangwa Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa burimo ariko bidahagarariye kuri uwo cyangwa undi , impanuka, rihanwa n'ingaruka ry'ibyangijwe.

Kuruwa Ruje ntabwo itanga ingwate kubikurikira , nikoreshwa rya API, Ikigega cy’amakuru , Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa kandi ntigomba kugenderwaho muburyo ubwo aribwo bwose cyangwa umukoresha wanyuma, cyangwa undi wese harimo kandi bitarangije  ubukererwe , amakosa  cyangwa kwibeshya  ugendeye kuri API, Ikigega cy’amakuru, Imenyesha ry'ibikorwa cyangwa  Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa bwamaze gutangwa.

entire_agreement.body: Amambwiriza ya API  agizwe n'amasezerano yuzuye  hagati yawe na Kuruwa Ruje ugendeye kukibazo kirimo kuba bikarenga ibibanje byavuzwe cyangwa byanditswe kandi byumvikana, byatangajwe cyangwa byemeranyijweho, bitarebeye cyane kubirimo hano. Kuruwa Ruje ifite uburenganzira bwo guhindura , ayamasezerano igihe icyo ari cyo cyose.
entire_agreement.heading: ibyemeranijwe ho byose:

terms_service_page.heading: ISOZWA RY'AMASEZERANO K'URUHUSA RWO GUKORESHA API
terms_service_page.intro:
EMERA: MUGKORESHA IYI SERIVISE CYANGWA KUREBA MUGASANDUGU BAGUHAYE, UMUKORESHA YEMERA KUBA AFATANYE NAYA MASEZERANO.

API ni igikoresho kigufasha ( Wowe) mukubona no gukoresha amakuru mashya ahari ya Kuruwa Ruje harimo namakuru y'ikirere n'ibiza bimenyeshwa no gukurikira amabwiriza (Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa) amakuru y'ibikorwa by'ubutumwa bwanditse  kuburyo bwo gutegura kubishobora gutera impanuka, ibyihutirwa ( Itegurwa, Isubizwa n’Igarurabutumwa, byose hamwe n'Amamenyesha y’Ibikorwa,n'Ikigega cy’amakuru). Itegurwa, Isubizwa n'Igarurabutumwa  biteganyijwe guherekeza Amamenyesha y'Ibikorwa cyangwa indi mburira ndetse n'ibyitonderwa bigaragara bifitanye isano n'ibyerekeye ikirere n'ibiza muri porogaramu yawe y'ubusabe. Ikoreshwa ry'ikigega cy'amakuru yawe rigengwa n'amahame ya API.

license_limitations.body: Ushobora gukoresha ikigega cy'amakuru gusa mu gihe bihuye n'impamvu y'ubusabe bwawe ku mahame ya API, bikanaguha guhama mu bijyanye na API nk'uko byakomeje kugenda bivugururwa. Wizejwe uburenganzira bwo gukura ibyo ushaka ku rubuga, nta guhezwa, kubuzwa cyangwa guhagarikwa, ukabikoresha, ukabibyaza umusaruro ndetse ukabisakaza ku bakoresha porogaramu yawe y'ubusabe ("Abakoresha porogaramu ba nyuma") ku Bikorwa by'Imenyesha bifitanye isano n'inyandiko zanditswe zitegura, zigasubiza zikanagarura ubutumwa, bigahura n'igenamiterere ryihuta y'ibikorwa bya muntu biburira bituruka mu makuru, bijyanye n'amahame ya API. Ushobora gukoresha API mu gufasha ku mpamvu zitari iz'ubucuruzi, bijyanye n'amahame ya API. Ntabwo wemerewe gukoresha API mu gufasha mu ikoreshwa ry'ikigega cy'amakuru mu buryo bwo gucuruza, Amamenyesha y'ibikorwa ndetse/cyangwa Itegurwa, Isubizwa n'Igarurabutumwa, harimo nta rutangira, kongera kugurisha amakuru, gusaba ikiguzi abayakoresha n'abayakwirakwiza cyangwa guca ikiguzi kuri gahunda yo kuyabyaza umusaruro. Kuruwa Ruje n'abatanga uburenganzira babungabunga umutwe wose, ubu nyirubwite, uburenganzira n'inyungu muri no kuri API, Itegurwa, Isubizwa n'Igarurabutumwa, Amamenyesha y'ibikorwa, Ikigega cy'amakuru n'inkomoko y'amakuru (nkuko byasobanuwe hasi). Uburenganzira bwose butagaragajwe burashinganye.
license_limitations.heading: Uruhushya n'imbibi:

overview.body: Porogaramu ya API y'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda y'Ikigo cy'Igihugu cyo Kwitegura Ibiza (API) itangwa na Red Cross y'Amerika. API isaba urufunguzo rwo kwiyandikisha. Mu gihe cyo kwiyandikisha, ugomba kwemera amategeko n'amabwiriza, hamwe n'amategeko n'amabwiriza mu masezerano ya Red Cross Web Site Terms of Service Agreement asanga kuri {0} (hamwe, 'Amategeko ya API'). Amategeko ya API azakurikizwa mu gukoresha API n'ibikoresho bya elektroniki bifashishijwe API. {1}

privacy_policy.body: Urumva, ukazirikana kandi ukemera ko gukora kwa porogaramu zimwe na zimwe, serivise, ibikoresho, uburyo bwo guhaha, ibikoresho cyangwa amakuru yo muri API bisaba itangwa , ikoreshwa n'ikwirakwizwa ry'amakuru aranga umuntu. Uko ubishatse, igihe wifuje kugera kuri API no kuyikoresha, uzirikana kandi ukanemera ko uko ukoresha API bizakomeza kwemeza amakuru aranga umuntu, ihuza n'ikoreshwa bifite ibanga ribigenga ryatangajwe: {0}
privacy_policy.heading: Ihame ry'ibanga

prohibited_activities.body: Wowe n'umukoresha wawe wa nyuma cyangwa umukozi ntimugomba gukoresha API cyangwa Ikigega cy'amakuru muri izi nzira:
prohibited_activities.heading: Ibikorwa n'imyitwarire bibujijwe:

prohibited_list.one: Kwivanga no guhungabanya serivise za Kuruwa Ruje cyangwa ububiko bw'amakuru.
prohibited_list.two: Kuzenguruka cyangwa guhindura urufunguzo urwo ari rwo rwose cyangwa uburyo bw'uburinzi bukoreshwa na Kuruwa Ruje cyangwa API, harimo kandi ntibigarukira ku bindi byerekeye ikoranabuhanga.
prohibited_list.three: Gusaba, Gukusanya cyangwa gusaba kubona amakuru no kubona ububasha bwo  kubona amazina yo kwinjira, ijambobanga cyangwa ubundi bubasha ku Kuruwa Ruje n'ibindi biguhabwa muri konti yawe.
prohibited_list.four: Kuvuga cyangwa kugerageza kwerekana ko ufitanye isano, uterwa inkunga cyangwa wemezwa mu buryo ubwari bwo bwose na Kuruwa Ruje cyangwa se n'indi miryango bifitanye isano.
prohibited_list.five: Kuvuga cyangwa kugerageza kwerekana ko uri nyirubite cyangwa wafunguje API, Ikigega cy'amakuru, Amamenyesha y'ibikorwa n' Itegurwa, Isubizwa no Igarurabutumwa.
prohibited_list.six: Guhererekanya virusi iyo ariyo yose, ubusembwa bw'iyangirika, Trojan horse cyangwa icyo ari cyo cyose gifite ubusha bwo kwangiza.

terms_service_page.reserve_rights: Kuruwa Ruje ifite uburenganzira bwo guhindura, cyangwa kutongera gutanga API n'Ikigega cy'amakuru muri rusange cyangwa mu bice, byaba iby'igihe gito n'ibizahoraho igihe icyo aricyo cyose nta rindi tangazo. Mu kwirinda urujijo, nta kintu kirimo hano gitegeka Umuryango utabara imbabare kugira API yayo cyangwa Ikigega cy'amakuru akugeraho, uremera kandi ukameza ko uburenganzira bwose n'ibindi byihariye biri mu bubasha bwa Kuruwa Ruje.

severability.body: Kuba inyandiko runaka yaba idafite agaciro, cyangwa ari amahame y'agateganyo ya API ntabwo bihindura agaciro k'izindi nyandiko.
severability.heading: Ububi bwabwo n'ibyo ukurirwaho:

suspension.body: Kuruwa Ruje ifite uburenganzira bwo guhagarika no kurangiza amasezerano yerekeye bubasha ufite bwo kubona amakuru mu gihe yabigennye, mu mwihariko wayo, mu gihe irimo gukoresha mu buryo butemewe API cyangwa Ikigega cy'amakuru nkuko byavuzwe mu mahame ya API cyangwa urimo gukoresha API cyangwa Ikigega cy'amakuru mu mirimo iyo ariyo yose ibangamira umutekano cyangwa umutuzo by'umuntu wese cyangwa umurongo w'Umuryango utabara imbabare.
suspension.heading: Isubikwa n'isozwa:

view_data.which: Ni ubuhe butumwa bwo kwirinda ushaka kureba?

user_agreement.title: Kwemererwa k'umukoresha
user_agreement.para_one: Mbere yuko wemera kwinjira muri Porotokole y'Ububiko bw'Ubutumwa bwo Kwirinda, nyamuneka soma wemere amategeko y'umasezerano wo gukoresha ukoresheje inyandiko iri hasi hanyuma ukande ahanditse 'Ndemera'.
user_agreement.download: Kanda hano ubone inyandiko yo kwemera y'umukoresha (105KB)

form.name: Izina ry’akarere
form.name_help: Tanga izina ry'intara ushaka gukora ubutumwa bwo kwirinda.
form.description_help: Tanga amakuru yimbitse yerekeranye na akarere, urugero agace ka Sani Furansisiko beyi.

subnationals.delete: Ibi biratuma hasibwa akarere ndetse n’andi makuru yari agashamikiyeho
